0.text: Innate: Whenever an enemy champion dies while Lissandra is nearby, she spawns a Frozen Thrall from their corpse.

1.text: Frozen Thralls are  invulnerable and  untargetable ice spirits that chase nearby  visible enemies, prioritizing  champions, and  slow all nearby enemies by 25%. After 4 seconds, they shatter to deal 120 − 520 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) magic damage to all nearby enemies.

2.text: Frozen Thralls gain bonus movement speed that increases in effectiveness over their lifespan.

0.text: Active: Lissandra hurls a spear of ice in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits and  slowing them for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: If the spear hits an enemy, it then shatters, gaining increased range and dealing the same damage to other enemies within its path, but not applying the slow.

0.text: Active: Lissandra freezes all nearby enemies, dealing them magic damage and  rooting them for a duration.

Active: Lissandra summons forth a claw of ice that moves in a line in the target direction, decelerating over 1.25 seconds and dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through. Glacial Path can be recast after 0.5 seconds while the claw is active.

1.text: Recast: Lissandra consumes the claw and  blinks to its current location.

0.text: Active: Lissandra can cast Frozen Tomb on a target enemy  champion or herself.

1.text: Enemy Cast: Lissandra freezes the target enemy champion,  knocking them down and  stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

2.text: Self Cast: Lissandra instantly entombs herself, placing herself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds while  healing herself over the duration, which is increased by 0% − 100% (based on missing health) at time of cast.

3.text: Frozen Tomb creates black ice which spreads out from the target and covers the surrounding area for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to all enemies that enter or are within the area and  slowing them for 0.5 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while they remain.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: After 0.3 seconds, unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, which deal 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies within their path and slows them by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: After 0.3 seconds, unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, which deal 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies within their path and  slows them by 65% for 1.5 seconds.
